aboutTitleP: Because Barq will make it easier for you to send your package with the features we offer
aboutTextH2: We deliver more than shipments — we deliver peace of mind and reliability
aboutTextP: Our team ensures every package reaches its destination safely and on time. With advanced tracking and dedicated support, we make shipping simple and worry-free for you.
servicesDesc: We provide comprehensive shipping solutions with speed, security, and full support for all your logistics needs.
servicesCard1p: We have a specialized customer service team to solve all our customers' problems and follow up with our customers moment by moment in managing their shipments.
servicesCard2p: Through your account on the company’s program, you will be able to track your shipments and see and know where each shipment you have with us
servicesCard3p: With our collection service, you can easily receive your collections daily, and we also offer you the possibility of obtaining an advance of up to 15%.
contactDesc: Get in touch to start shipping your goods
footerTitleP3: the fastest shipment in Egypt from Cairo and Giza to Alexandria, Lower Egypt, Hurghada and Upper Egypt
